summary: Donald Trump claims at the Trump Nashville event on March 15th, 2017 that the ruling on immigration makes the United States look weak, but he argues that the country is no longer weak. He states that they will fight the ruling and take the case to the Supreme Court if necessary, with the goal of winning and keeping citizens safe.

Donald Trump claims at the Trump Nashville event on March 15th, 2017 that he will enforce trade rules, bring back jobs to the United States, support law enforcement, protect freedoms, defend the Second Amendment, and restore respect for the country and its flag.
Claim: Donald Trump claims that if a company wants to leave America, fire their workers, and then ship their new products back into the country, there will be consequences.
